value_claims.claim_title: Brisbane Catholic Education saves educators 9.3 hours per week with Microsoft 365 Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: Educators using Microsoft 365 Copilot and a generative AI tool developed with Microsoft Copilot Studio to integrate Catholic traditions and values into the classroom reported saving an average of 9.3 hours per week.
value_claims.source_quote: Brisbane Catholic Education equips Microsoft 365 Copilot and utilizes Microsoft Copilot Studio to develop a generative AI tool that helps integrate Catholic traditions and values into the classroom. Educators reported saving an average of 9.3 hours per week.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The time savings are directly attributed to the use of Microsoft 365 Copilot and the generative AI tool developed with Copilot Studio.

value_claims.claim_title: EchoStar Hughes projects 35,000 work hours saved with Azure AI Foundry apps
value_claims.claim_description: EchoStar Hughes division created 12 production apps using Azure AI Foundry, including automated sales call auditing and customer retention analysis. These solutions are projected to save 35,000 work hours and boost productivity by at least 25%.
value_claims.source_quote: EchoStar Hughes division leveraged Microsoft Azure AI Foundry to create 12 new production apps, including automated sales call auditing, customer retention analysis, and field services process automation. These solutions are projected to save 35,000 work hours and boost productivity by at least 25%.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The work hour savings and productivity boost are directly attributed to the 12 production apps created using Azure AI Foundry.

value_claims.claim_title: BKW processes media inquiries 50% faster with Edison platform
value_claims.claim_description: BKW developed Edison using Azure AI Foundry and Azure OpenAI services. Within two months, 8% of staff were actively using Edison, media inquiries were processed 50% faster, and more than 40 use cases were documented.
value_claims.source_quote: BKW developed Edison, a platform using Microsoft Azure, Azure AI Foundry, and Azure OpenAI services, to securely and effectively tap into internal data. Within two months of its roll-out, 8% of staff were actively using Edison, media inquiries were processed 50% faster, and more than 40 use cases were documented.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The 50% faster processing of media inquiries is directly attributed to the Edison platform built with Azure AI services.

value_claims.claim_title: BKW achieves 8% staff adoption of Edison platform within two months

value_claims.source_quote: BKW developed Edison, a platform using Microsoft Azure, Azure AI Foundry, and Azure OpenAI services, to securely and effectively tap into internal data. Within two months of its roll-out, 8% of staff were actively using Edison, media inquiries were processed 50% faster, and more than 40 use cases were documented.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The 8% staff adoption rate is directly attributed to the Edison platform built with Azure AI services.

value_claims.claim_title: Access Holdings reduces code writing time from 8 hours to 2 hours with Microsoft 365 Copilot
value_claims.claim_description: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot, integrating generative AI into daily tools. Writing code now takes two hours instead of eight.
value_claims.source_quote: Access Holdings Plc adopted Microsoft 365 Copilot, integrating generative AI into daily tools. As a result, writing code now takes two hours instead of eight, chatbots launch in 10 days instead of three months, and presentations are prepared in 45 minutes instead of six hours.
value_claims.attribution_evidence: The reduction in code writing time from 8 to 2 hours is directly attributed to Microsoft 365 Copilot.
